name: Hardest Castle Run
description:
A new kind of platform runner game you can play with one hand. Hardest Castle plays as a side-scrolling, auto-runner platformer game. The player controls Knight Sebastian as he automatically runs from left to right, jumping on his own to clear small gaps or obstacles. Knight Sebastian is an knight and He must save the princess's dogs and her from the dangerous castle. Knight constantly runs forward, while you time your taps to pull off stylish jumps and moves to gather coins and reach the goal!
To run away from enemies and dodge the obstacles use the halt feature. In Hardest Castle timing is everything. Save the dogs and open the gates. Lots of platforming obstacles.

Features:
- 8 bit retro style graphics and animations
- Retro chiptune musics and sounds
- 30 levels
- Game center leaderboard
